name: Switch Climb
description:
A game made for the Xanderjam #4 - Summer Jam with the theme "Opposites attract"

Switch Climb is a 10 level game based around the abilities of a slime named Switch, as he climbs up a tower!

Controls:

Press Z to switch the polarity of all highlighted magnets on screen.

Press X to cling onto magnets.

Press R for a quick restart.

WASD to move or Arrow Keys.

Press Space to jump.
